## Weekly schedule

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
wkno <- c(1, 2)
date <- c("April 25, 2024", "May 2, 2024")
Topic <- c("[Introduction to R Programming](https://hellor.netlify.app/2021/week1/l12021#1)", "[Data Structures in R](https://hellor.netlify.app/slides/l22021#1)")
reading <- c("[Reading 2.1, 2.2, 5.1](https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/basics.html)", "To be added")
cheatsheet <- c("[cheatsheet](https://hellor.netlify.app/cheatsheets/baser.pdf)", "")
exercise <- c("[Exercise 1.8]( https://thiyangt.github.io/rbook/intro.html)", "To be added")
df <- tibble(wkno, date, Topic, cheatsheet,reading, exercise)
colnames(df) <- c("Week No.", "Date", "Topic", "Cheatsheet", "Reading", "Exercise"
                  )
df |> knitr::kable()
```
